Very buggy, if you want Half-Life just get the real one, this one sucks, the only thing made with graphics is the lighting (Buggy in some parts) and the Wobbly Water, if you get it for Gmod that's okay. Just don't play this one, I beg you.
Be honest: You just bought this so you could have Half-Life: Source content mounted onto Garry's Mod.
Only good reason about this game is that you can mount it on gmod :)

Качайте Half-Life: Source Fixed!

Хз зачем существует эта игра. Модели лишь слегка видоизменены, визуальные фичи Source здесь всраты, да и с физикой не поиграешься, как во второй части. Автомат стреляет с такой отдачей, что из дробовика легче попасть по врагу вдалеке. Какой-то модер починил все эти недостатки, но от этого больше смысла игре не прибавилось, ибо по опыту это те же яйцы, только всмятку.

Half-Life: Source is simply a proof-of-concept from before Half-Life 2 was released, where they basically just put Half-Life on the Source engine, and added rag-dolls, wavy water and shiny floor. (way too shiny)
As of 2014, this game is very broken, and still has not been fixed.
Overall, not worth it! I only have this because it came as part of "Valve Complete Pack".
If you are looking for Half-Life, play the original. If you are looking for Half-Life with improved graphics and gameplay, play Black Mesa. It is an actual QUALITY remake of the original. This is just disgraceful...
There is absolutely no reason to play this version, just play OG half life.
сама игра хороша но баги и не сочетание некоторых элементов например вода и блики от оружия просто убивают всё желание играть в это

Szczerze mówiąc, ta gra naprawdę długo tkwiła w mojej bibliotece, ale kiedy w końcu odważyłem się ten "remaster" odpalić, to naprawdę się rozczarowałem, jest masa błędów i niedopracowań, czasami oświetlenie psuje klimat i niektóre momenty zmieniły się na złe, ale też są dobre rzeczy, woda lepiej wygląda, fizyka kuszy działa lepiej i w tle widać grafikę 3D. No ale trzeba przyznać, że to mało. Więc jak chcesz zagrać w Half-Life'a za 36 złotych, kup oryginał.
Terrible, get the original instead.

Solid game. 
Classic game that I finally wanted to play. Not disappointed. Fun puzzles, nice level design and cool enemies.  
If you are good at fps, play on difficult and you will be challenged in some places. If you are not careful with your HP and energy you might have to load quite old saves to replay more carefully.

Has some bugs. One area had heavy texture glitches for me but it was possible to get through.
Ein sehr tolles Spiel.

In Half-Life we play Gordon Freeman, a theoretical physicist working at Black Mesa who is late for work. After witnessing unexpected events in the experiment that Gordon is part of, he has the mission to go through the Black Mesa facilities and help his colleagues and then teleport to the Xen dimension and end his journey with an unexpected ending. As for the gameplay, the aiming system and the gameplay in general is very good and still very enjoyable. It is true that the graphics are not its strongest section (let's be fair they are from 1998), but they take a back seat when you are immersed in the story that this game has.
